181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600.14: speak Penny "I brought my students here for an outdoor teaching session.#$b#I'm teaching them about nature... life in the country, that kind of thing.#$b#You know all about life in the country, right?$h"
181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600.22: speak Penny "Jas! Vincent! I've got a surprise for you!"
181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600.37: speak Penny "I have a very special guest here to talk to you today... our very own local farmer, @.#$b#He has first-hand experience living in the countryside... so he knows all about the valley's natural resources!^She has first-hand experience living in the countryside... so she knows all about the valley's natural resources!"

choseMinerals.14: speak Penny "Vincent! That's a horrible thing to say! Mind your manners!$a"

181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600.39: speak Penny "Can either of you give me some examples of natural resources? Points for creativity!"
181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600.47: speak Jas "Let's see... wood and stone are good for building, there's also wild plants and animals for eating... fish count too!$4#$b#The mines have lots of valuable metals, gems, and minerals in them... out in the forest there's hardwood and mushrooms and...$4"
181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600.49: speak Penny "Heh... that's a lot of examples! Good job, Jas.$h"

318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat.7: speak Jas "Eugh... it smells like something died...$s"

3910979/f Vincent 2000/f Jas 2000/t 600.61: speak Jas "Wait, what do you do with the bugs, Vincent?"
3910979/f Vincent 2000/f Jas 2000/t 600.70: speak Jas "You're always such a brute...$a"
3910979/f Vincent 2000/f Jas 2000/t 600.72: speak Jas "@, maybe instead you should try putting them somewhere safe. No need to be stupid like Vincy."

181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600.67: speak Vincent "...Are you Miss Penny's boyfriend? Back off...$s^Hey, do you have a boyfriend?$h"
181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600.68: speak Penny "Vincent! You're old enough to know better than to say stuff like that!$a"

choseFarming.10: speak Vincent "Hey, farmer. Is it true that if you eat a lot of vegetables you get strong?#$b#I wanna be strong enough to lift a whole person like my brother Sam can!$h#$b#He picked Miss Penny clear off the ground last night when they were climbing into a tree.$h"

choseAnimals.8: speak Vincent "Hey, farmer. Do you ever think about riding one of your cows into town and wrecking the whole place?$h"

choseMinerals.8: speak Vincent "Hey, farmer. Have you ever seen a goblin? I hear they like to kidnap girls like Jas and eat them.^Hey, farmer. Have you ever seen a goblin? I hear they like to kidnap girls like you and Jas and then eat them!"

318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat.21: speak Vincent "...$s#$b#Why is it locked? Do they really wanna keep us out that bad, or...$s#$b#Maybe the lock isn't to keep *us* out, but to keep something else in... *shiver*$s"
318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat.67: speak Jas "You're right, there's something moving around in there!$u"

3910979/f Vincent 2000/f Jas 2000/t 600.20: speak Vincent "Spring onion... me and Jas come out and pick these for fun!"
3910979/f Vincent 2000/f Jas 2000/t 600.38: speak Vincent "You're really nice for an old man... so I'm going to show you a secret.$h^You're really nice for an old lady... so I'm going to show you a secret.$h"
3910979/f Vincent 2000/f Jas 2000/t 600.53: speak Vincent "...It's full of bugs! So be careful."
3910979/f Vincent 2000/f Jas 2000/t 600.64: speak Vincent "Ehh... usually I just squash 'em between my fingers."

318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat.25: speak Jas "I think the key is at the museum."
318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat.28: speak Vincent "The museum? Why do you think it'd be there?$u"
318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat.30: faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "I saw a big rusty old key fall out of Gunther's pocket one time.#$b#A creepy sewer door like this has just got to be a match for a big rusty old key.$4"

Changes.LogName: Forest Events - Penny dead or kids too old to be schooled
